title: Lag and FPS Drop...
body: I am getting high ping when it is freaking midnight where no one is awake and no one is using the internet. Other than that my FPS drops from 230+ to 40 FPS ...

replies.body:
Hey SorakaXHealBoT,

One thing I'd suggest trying is to change the framerate from uncapped to 144fps.  This can often smooth out glitches that can happen when League runs at high framerates.

Cheers
Mindstar

That didn't help at all ... recently my ping is around double the usual ping i get and whenever i cast a spell my character freezes and then cast the spell after like 2-3 seconds and i have trouble auto attacking enemies.

Thanks for the reply - next time you have the issue with high ping, can you guys post a trace route to 103.240.227.1.  I'd also suggest you go through the steps in [troubleshooting connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) if you haven't already.
I'm lagging as well with Summoner and ARAM games.  Pings ranging in 300-800+
